item.description:
I do not come to Sports Haven to gamble, but I know that some do.

I usually get something to eat & drink to just look at the various
Huge screens. Unlike most places, normally, it is very easy to
Have a conversation & hear what the other people are saying. : )
Some times the patrons get excited & yell but that is rare.

Directions to Sports Haven

http://sportshavenrac...

sportshavenracing.blogspot.com/search/label/Directions

Once you walk in, I suggest that you take a right & walk up the ramp.

Keep on walking until you get to the Food Court (FC).

If I am not in the FC, then I will be at a table just outside of the
FC eating & watching the screens.

If we have too many people for a table, then we can move over
to other chairs.

What is Sports Haven?
Sports Haven, located in New Haven, CT, is the place to watch and wager
on the best thoroughbred, harness, greyhound and jai-alai action from
across the country. The action all comes alive on movie size screens.
The complex features a Las Vegas style race book, the infamous shark bar,
Planet Wings (food court), the balcony level Silks restaurant and sky-box suites.
For info, call 203-946-3100.

http://travel.yahoo.c...


travel.yahoo.com/p-travelguide-2817514-sports_haven_new_haven-i

If there is any bad weather, then this Meet Up will be cancelled.
item.how_to_find_us: I will contact those who RSVP Yes or Maybe.
item.name: Coffee Talk drops by Sports Haven in New Haven
